message.raw:
Merged in nvidia_gpu_natively_support- (pull request #234)

nvidia-docker2 packages are deprecated in Docker version >= 19.03, and NVIDIA GPUs are now natively supported as devices in the Docker runtime.

Approved-by: Steven Peters <scpeters@osrfoundation.org>
Approved-by: Ian Chen <ichen@osrfoundation.org>

message:
Merged in nvidia_gpu_natively_support- (pull request #234)

nvidia-docker2 packages are deprecated in Docker version >= 19.03, and NVIDIA GPUs are now natively supported as devices in the Docker runtime.
